summary:
You want to look exactly like Dovahkiin on the Skyrim wallpapers but you dont like the low-resolution original iron and hide textures?!
Then this mod is for you! This is a WIP. The Helmet is done already.
descriptionHtml:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/703/theelderscrollsvskyrimw.jpg/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/1515/theelderscrollsvskyrimw.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]


[center][size=+2]Detailed Dragonborn Iron Armor WIP[/size][/center]
[center]by DonkelOktor[/center]

[center]My other Skyrim mod:[/center]
[center][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2797]Daedric Arrows and Quiver Retextured[/url][/center]


[size=+2]--Description--[/size]

You want to look exactly like Dovahkiin on the Skyrim wallpapers but you dont like the low-resolution original iron and hide textures?!
Then this mod is for you!

This is a complete handmade HD retexture of the iron helmet. 
Also i made a complete new normalmap so that the texture is much more detailed then the original one. Because I never made a texture and photo editing was quiet new for me I watched a lot of tutorials and worked on the helmet for about 60 hours!
But i think the work was worth it ;) 
Until now its just the helmet in 7 different versions but the rest will follow! 

(The black part on the horn which is seen in the pictures is NOT seen ingame and cant be changed)


[b]Please endorse this mod if you like it and I am happy about every comment  ;)[/b]

[size=+2]--Things to do--[/size]
-Retexture the rest of the iron armor for the ones who want the complete iron armor
-Retexture the studded armor Dovahkiin wears on the screenshots! 
-If the CS comes out: Put the armor ingame as a complete heavy, or optional complete light   armor!

[size=+2]--Preview--[/size]


[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/708/vergleichq.jpg/][IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/9643/vergleichq.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]


[size=+2]--Installation--[/size]

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

[size=+2]--Uninstallation--[/size]
Remove the following files:

Data\\textures\\armor\\iron\\m\\helmetplate01
Data\\textures\\armor\\iron\\m\\helmetplate01_n

[size=+2]--Credits--[/size]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
And thanks to all the guys who do tutorials in their freetime so that newbies like me can learn!


[size=+2]--Distribution Permission--[/size]

You may use the content for your own mods, permission from me is required.
You may not redistribute this mod in any way or claim it as your own.
author: DonkelOktor
